summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Building Department; increasing certain Objects of Expenditure in Program Category "Real Estate and Property Management" (Code 1300) in the 1975 Budget of the Building Department for expenses incurred in the administration of the disposition of real property originally acquired by the State of Washington for the R. H. Thomson Expressway and subsequently transferred to the City, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, declaring the Emergency therefor and repealing Ordinance 104754.
